title: GST compensation for 8 months released to states, Rs 78,704 cr pending: Finance Ministry - Economic Times
content: GST compensation for 8 months released to states, Rs 78,704 cr pending: Finance Ministry  Economic Times
description: In a statement, the ministry said normally, GST compensation for 10 months (April-January) of any financial year is released during that year and the compensation of February-March is released only in the next financial year.
